skins.shipDescription: Baltimore-class heavy cruiser C Baltimore, Hull Number CA-68.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Baltimore, the lead ship of my class of CAs. I was the first CA to be designed and constructed without the limitations of any naval treaties, thanks to which I could equip cutting-edge weaponry for the time. And within this fleet, I will fight for justice and freedom.
skins.acquisition: Heya. Are you in need of help? I'm Baltimore, a heavy cruiser just passing by... Okay, that's enough jokes for now... Baltimore, awaiting your orders, Commander.
skins.login: Okay! Let's get to work, Commander!
skins.details: What you can do, what you should do, and what you will do C the choices one must make. You, however, need only focus on what you do best, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'll get this work done in good time. I mean, that's what you should expect of your subordinate, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: SHE'S Quincy?! L-looks pretty different from the one I know... But I guess it's not that unusual for ships to share the same name.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Power alone won't fundamentally solve all one's problems. This should go without saying, Commander, but please try to remember this fact.
skins.secretaryTouch: Could you fetch me an Oxy-cola? Thanks... Ahhh! That hits the spot!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! ... Y-you did not just hear that, got it?!

skins.shipDescription: Oh, you wanna observe my club activities, Commander? Ahah, as you can tell, it's just a sports club with the goal of making you sweat. Nothing suspicious about that, is there...?
skins.acquisition: Oh, you wanna observe my club activities, Commander? Ahah, as you can tell, it's just a sports club with the goal of making you sweat. Nothing suspicious about that, is there...?
skins.details: Do you know how to get to my clubroom? Or should I show you the way?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Our club is mainly for having fun, so anyone can join. You should join a club you'd like too, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yo, Cleveland! Up for another round of basketball later? You bring Independence and I'll get Pittsburgh on the team!
skins.secretaryIdle3: A drink? Sure, I could use one! ... Ahh, that's the ticket!
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, my uniform's completely soaked... T-thanks for letting me know...

skins.shipDescription: Heya, you here to watch the game? Heh, heavy cruiser Baltimore, the passerby solver of troubles, here to play it cool!
skins.acquisition: Heya, you here to watch the game? Heh, heavy cruiser Baltimore, the passerby solver of troubles, here to play it cool!
skins.login: All right, let's do like always and breeze through these tasks.
skins.details: I'm radiating unusually dark vibes? Thanks for the compliment. I guess these decal tattoos Bremerton recommended are doing their job. As in, they make people a little more cautious around me than they normally would be.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Bremerton's got a real knack for psychological warfare. She often gives me good advice on how to present myself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm an expert at tennis, as you'd expect. If anything, you'd be kinda hard-pressed to find a sport I *don't* excel at.
skins.secretaryIdle3: So Commander, are you free after we're done here? Hahah, what, is it *that* unusual of me to ask if you wanna hang out?
skins.secretaryTouch: I know I'm eyecatching, but I didn't hope you'd stare so intensely at me... I mean, that's not to say I *don't* want you stare at me, but...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eep?! Come on, I've *told* you I'm sensitive to this sort of stuff!

skins.shipDescription: Damn, that Bremerton... What did she make me wear this time... Even though I was the one to ask her for advice... Um... Ugh... This doesn't look too weird, right...?
skins.acquisition: Damn, that Bremerton... What did she make me wear this time... Even though I was the one to ask her for advice... Um... Ugh... This doesn't look too weird, right...?
skins.login: Oh, you can sit here if you want to, Commander. I'll just... stand here for a while and accustom myself to this look.
skins.details: Bremerton said, "When you change your look, your mannerisms usually change too" and suggested this dress to me... She must be snickering at me actually wearing it right now...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I should've gone with a less cumbersome outfit, shouldn't I? Maybe something like Cleveland's suit... Yeah, that would've worked...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll bet tons of girls want to share a drink with you tonight, right, Commander? Go on, chat with them before I get you wasted. Or you can just stay here, hahahah.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The mirror? It's so I can see myC Oh god!
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah?! Ah, thanks... Guess it's a real uphill battle, getting used to these high heels...
